name: ronja
notes:
you will need a size us 2.5 (3.0 mm) circular needle, no longer than 16" (40 cm) or a set of double pointed needles in this size. 

you will also need a set of double pointed nttedles in size us 5 (3.75 mm) 

finished measurements: 19" (48 cm) in circumference, 7.75"(20 cm) high above eye opening and the ribbing measures 10.5" (27 cm) long.

shown in two colourways -

yarn used:
rowan selects norwegian wool

colourway a.
a. 014 cloud dancer - 2 balls
b. 012 golden nugget - 1 ball
c. 018 ribbon red - 1 ball
d. 011 daphne - 1 ball

colourway b.
a. 019 peat - 2 balls
b. 014 cloud dancer - 1 ball
c. 011 daphne - 1 ball
d. 010 wind chimes - 1 ball
